reviewText: Nothing like a good old musical.  arrived on time in great condition, and great price. Everyone in the family will enjoy.

I was very pleased to get these two movies together. They're enjoyable, happy movies made in a style that seems to be forgotten today. The Seven Brides for Seven Brothers DVD mentions a second disc and the cover says the DVD is dual-layer - but there's no third DVD and I haven't found a way to access any other features on the DVD, so I'm guessing the mention of a second disc is perhaps from another package where there were two discs. Other than that, everything with the DVDs is great. Buy, watch and enjoy!
Love both of these movies

If you haven't seen these musicals, buy them now.  My 10 year olds love these movies.  They are fun and the music is great.  There is no performer like Doris Day and this is one of her best and Howard Keel---oh my gosh.  He is the most beautiful singer.  If you want something you and your kids can watch together and enjoy, watch Calamity Jane.  Seven Brides for Seven Brothers is another beautiful classic film, with lots of great music and characters.  It's another awesome musical that we all love.  Buy this for your family!  You'll love it!

I love both of these movies. After we threw out our DVD player, I wanted to make sure I bought these two on DVD. I was slightly skeptical because of the price (considering these movies were rather popular). The visuals and sounds for both movies were very good, considering what the VHS version was like. I didn't have any problems.
I generally don't like old musicals, but this one is exceptional. I highly recommend it.

2 wonderful musicals at one low price! I won't bore you with the actual plot descriptions but they are both highly entertaining musicals that my daughters have watched repeatedly for many years. The price is cheaper for the twofer than for each separate movie. You may also want to search for "Musical Collections" and that will bring up 2 - 4 movie sets that are a bargain in price even if you don't care for all of them. The clarity is very good, wonderful color and sound which is a must with musicals.
